1374410.name: TCSTRIKERS2
1374410.description:
"This super cold winter weather
must be inconvenient for you. (Chewy chewy.) "
"They can’t even run a ski resort in this
extreme weather. (Chewy chewy.) "
"You’re right. All we can do is eat some
Mochi in a hotel room. (Chewy chewy.) "
"I'm going to investigate,
but I don't know if I can live up to your expectation. "
"Would you like some more Mochi? "
"No thanks. "

Wind is blowing heavily outside accompanied with snow. Spring would’ve
already come at this time of the year. Someone from a travel agency,
which took a hit from the abonormal climate, came to visit Techno.

Joshua is digging deep into climates all over the world, and there is
one place showing abnormal values.Seems like they can’t measure the
precise values only in that place for some reason.

Techno and Joshua go to the actual spot. The locals are scared of one
mountain there, because it’s said that there dwells a spirit.That spirit is
said to be of a woman who died of the plague of old times.



○User Guide

Z : Shot (Decide)
X : Bomb (Cancel)
C : PowerShot
Shift : Laser

Skip conversation
•Hold down shot and bomb in the conversation.

Bomb
•Used 275 power.

Slow movement while the laser is in use.

Score extension system (maximum 3 times).
*Even if you select full screen, it doesn't work, press Alt+Enter.


○Lock

If you are hit in the normal state (default), it will go into a locked state.

Locked state

•Bombs cannot be used.
•Fixed attack level.
•You will lose if you are hit.
•The remaining time until unlock is displayed under the aircraft.

Time to unlock.

•Number of locks x 20 seconds.
*The last remaining aircraft is always 20 seconds.
•A mistake resets the lock count.
•The remaining time will decrease by touching the P item.


○Technical Shoot

•The final stage of each boss is a Technical Shoot(with exception).
•This time, there is no penalty for being hit.
•Technical Shoot Bonus


Time remaining x Reference point
•Jewel (intportant)
•If you get through "technical shoot" with no mistakes, you get a jewel.


At the end of Stage 5, if you have 7jewel ,
you will enter the EXTRA LAST STAGE.



○How to Get Score

Each enemy has a set of base points.

If you knock down an enemy while the combo is in progress.
1. base points are added to the bonus points
2. bonus points are added to the score

Conditions to Continue Combo.

•Defeat the enemy.
•Hit the laser.
•Touch the P item (the number of combos does not increase).


Full combo can be available in all stages.
